What is a professional year program (PYP)?

A professional year program (PYP) is an organized training program given to overseas students in an attempt to provide a platform to learn the method of implementing the theoretical knowledge studied in their college study. This program is focused on international students in Australia. It usually lasts for a year and combines formal education with real-world experience to assist students in bridging the gap between school and career paths. The curriculum is frequently provided in collaboration with universities, TAFEs, or professional associations and is specially created to satisfy the needs of students who are majoring in specialized fields including engineering, information technology, and accounting.

The primary goal of PYP is to help students develop their professional skills and gain relevant work experience while studying for their undergrad degree to improve their chances of securing employment after graduation. The partnered universities of A One Global also offer this program which adds value to your four years of hard work in college and makes you eligible for better job opportunities at your preferred career path.
